about_the_game:
You wake up from a nightmare and find that your memory has become ambiguous, and you can't even confirm your name. You can only rely on the name "Qi Yi" called by people around you to find your own survival, but the bizarre events that followed have made your identity more and more confusing. Is the truth hidden behind the fog really what you expected?

After a burst of inexplicable dizziness, you returned to college, but everything around you is not the same as your vague memory. Just when you want to know your own situation, a strange murder case of falling from a building brings those familiar and unfamiliar people together with you, and the real murderer is also hidden among you ...

When you wake up in a mental hospital, the familiar faces appear in front of you in different identities, but their memories are not the same as yours. In a controlled state, you want to find a way out of this environment, and at this time, the same group of people have triggered a new murder ...

Game features

※ Infinite flow's suspense reasoning

Connect the cases with different story backgrounds, find clues and catch the real murderer hidden among the partners!

※ Daily communication and interaction

In the gap time outside the copy, you can have a unique story with the female characters and have a deeper emotional connection with them.

Role introduction

● Qi Yi

The name someone told you seems to be a mystery writer. You have no real feelings with vague memories and are trying to find your true self.

● Su Yunyao

Reporter, gentle in character, but also does some small practical jokes on familiar people. She is curious about your identity and story and is trying to get you to provide her with more information.

● Zhao Yan

A promising young painter and a rich family environment have cultivated her into an arrogant young lady. She is not very good at expressing her kindness directly and will use indirect methods to get your attention.

● Xu Yueran

Online celebrity, a minor celebrity, has two faces in front of and behind the camera, and has a dream of becoming a big star. She has gained a lot of attention because she accidentally interacted with you in the live broadcast. Now she is pestering you in various ways and wants you to live with her again.

● Wen Yishu

The woman who suddenly moved next door claimed to have taken care of your sister since she was a child, but you have no memory of her and always cook something for you, saving your stomach from being tortured by Lin Busheng all the time.

● Lin Busheng

Your college classmate, now roommate, likes sports, but his brain doesn't seem to be very smart.

● Gu Wenhan

The boss who runs a biotechnology company is very strict with you for some reason.

● Chen Shengran

I was once helped by you, and I admired you very much when I learned that you were a novelist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: This is a suspense reasoning interactive work with real people. You will play the protagonist "Qi Yi", find evidence in a series of murders, piece together the truth, and find the ultimate murderer, all of which will lead you to an unpredictable future.
